text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Refurbished: Lenovo Z50 (59436279) B Grade Certified Refurbished Notebook (Scratch & Dent) Intel Core i7 4510U (2.00 GHz) 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Intel HD Graphics 4400 15.6" Windows 8.1 64-Bit is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The Intel Core i7 in the Refurbished: Lenovo Z50 (59436279) B Grade Certified Refurbished Notebook (Scratch & Dent) Intel Core i7 4510U (2.00 GHz) 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Intel HD Graphics 4400 15.6" Windows 8.1 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
